title: Introduction to C Programming
description: A versatile language for system-level and application development, known for its efficiency and low-level hardware control

title: Introduction to Algorithms.
description: Step-by-step procedures to solve problems efficiently, a foundation of computer science and programming.

title: Introduction to C++ for DSA
description: C++ language application in Data Structures and Algorithms, commonly used for competitive programming and software development.

title: Basic Data Structures
description: Data structures are ways to organize and store data efficiently. Common data structures include arrays, linked lists, stacks, queues, trees, and graphs.

title: Introduction to OOP Python
description: Python's object-oriented programming capabilities, emphasizing class and object usage for modular and maintainable code.

title: Software Engineering
description: A systematic approach to software development, covering design, testing, and maintenance of high-quality software systems.

title: AWS, Cloud Computing
description: Amazon Web Services offers cloud services for scalable, flexible, and accessible computing resources over the internet.

title: Database (MySQL)
description: An open-source relational database system for efficient storage, retrieval, and management of structured data

title: Problem-Solving
description: The core skill of breaking down complex problems, devising solutions using algorithms and data structures in programming.
